channel.title: Sides on Seasoned Recipes

item.title: Apple Cranberry Walnut Salad
item.description: Apple Cranberry Walnut Salad # Green Apple

item.title: Bruschetta
item.description: Perfect to bring along for a picnic or bbq

item.title: Chimichurri
item.description: Ingredient Amount Oregano 1 bunch Parsley 1 fistful Chili 1 Corriander Seed 1-2 teaspoons Nutmeg ?

item.title: Christmas Ham
item.description: Ham baked in a cherry glaze

item.title: Cold Celeriac Slaw
item.description: Cold Celeriac Slaw # Celeriac chopped into small battons.

item.title: Fennel & Tomato w/ Herbs
item.description: Fennel & Tomato w/ Herbs # Fennel cherry tomato lemon olive oil mint & dill

item.title: Garlic Bread
item.description: Roast a head of garlic and mix with butter.

item.title: Guac
item.description: Ingredients # Avocado Red onion Lime Juice Corriander Yoghurt Chili

item.title: Mums Gravy
item.description: If you’ve cooked any meats like a roasted chicken or a leg of lamb, the drippings left over in the pan are flavours that are waiting to be unlocked.

item.title: Pangritata
item.description: Ingredients Bread Olive Oil Salt Break down some bread and slash it in the pan with olive oil (if you’ve got confit garlic, heat it up in the oil first to flavour it).

item.title: Pickled Red Onions
item.description: Ingredient Amount Red Onions sliced White Vinegar Sugar Salt Corriander seeds whole possible to add a bay leaf and/or peppercorns

item.title: Salsa
item.description: Fresh Salsa # Tomatoes Red onion Chili Lime Juice Corriander

item.title: Smashed Avo
item.description: Ingredients # Avocado Salt Pepper Lemon Sourdough Optional: Egg & Bacon

item.title: Spiced Apple Sauce
item.description: Ingredients # Apple Sugar Cinnamon Orange Zest

item.title: Texas Slaw
item.description: Main Ingredients # Green Apple Carrot (grated thick) Red Cabbage Red Onion Corriander Dressing # Djon mustard Olive Oil Mayple Syrup Ground cumin Orange Yoghurt Salt & Pepper

item.title: Tuna Salad
item.description: Ingredient Amount Tuna in Oil 2 cans Kewpie Mayo To mix Australian Mustard To mix Celery 1 stick Dill small bunch Salt to taste Method # Drain one can of the oil but add the other one oil and all into a bowl.

item.title: Tzatziki
item.description: Ingredient Amount Yoghurt ~1 cup Cucumber 1 Garlic 1 clove Dill 3 tablespoons Lemon 1/2 Salt to taste Method # Grate the cuccumber on a box grater (largest) over a bowl lined with a disposable cloth.
